lead_paragraph: Infiniti, Nissan Motor Co's premium brand, will display a concept car at next week's Geneva motor show that will hint at a new "Formula One-inspired" high-performance model based on its Q60 coupe.

headline.main: A Stylish Base in Paris for Exploring the Right Bank
